\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4672"\w*, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H3068"\w* men \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* amongst \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w goodly|strong="H8389"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*.” \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* roar \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* \w fire|strong="H3341"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w broken|strong="H7489"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gentle \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w led|strong="H2986"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2873"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* didn’t \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w plans|strong="H4284"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saying, “\w Let|strong="H3808"\w*’s \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w fruit|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w*’s \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w*.”
